title: 3D Walkable Maze Android Wear
summary: Navigate a 3D maze on your Android Wear watch by walking around in real life.
description: -Navigate through a 3D maze on your Android Wear smartwatch.-Walk around in real life with the accelerometer/compass to move- no tapping on the screen required!-Don't forget to "watch" where you're going :-)Now fully updated to support Android Wear 5.0 Lollipop.
descriptionHTML:
-Navigate through a 3D maze on your Android Wear smartwatch.
-Walk around in real life with the accelerometer/compass to move- no tapping on the screen required!
-Don't forget to "watch" where you're going :-)

Now fully updated to support Android Wear 5.0 Lollipop.
comments: Meh It's pretty cool but I can't get it to really work at all on the Moto 360 or Sony SW3 only works on my G Watch R would be pretty great if bugs get ironed out
Aughhhh Won't work on moto 360, just looks around and does not walk. Please add support for the moto 360?
Not working on Moto 360. I walk around my house and it just looks around.
Good idea But laggy on watches
Worthless Are you kidding me with this garbage?
There is a black square in the center of the screen, but other than that it seems to be fully functional.
recentChanges: Fixed display issue on watches running Android Wear 5.0 (Lollipop).
